activities: Collect information in connection with retail sales both online & in stores; use information for the specific purpose collected (purchase, returns, etc.) as well as marketing; advertising; development & sale of products & services; improving content of sites and other uses as permitted by law & the customer.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data - name, address, email address, billing information, etc.  Manually processed data is included.
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities for organization human resources data; Direct Marketing Association Safe Harbor Program dispute resolution for all other data.
